With the Pro version, you can change the: With the Pro version, you can change the look and feel of your website in seconds. In just a few clicks, you can change the colour and typography of your website. The premium version lets you have better control over the theme as it comes with more customisation options. Not just that, the theme also has more sections and layout options as compared to the free version. The Pro version is multi-language compatible as well.
You can change the copyright text going: You can change the copyright text by going to %1$s Appearance > Customise > Footer Settings. %2$s However, if you want to hide the author credit text, please %3$s.
Also, you might experience a slower resp: Also, you might experience a slower response time during the weekend, so please bear with us.
Before you send us a support ticket for: Before you send us a support ticket for any issues, please make sure you have updated the theme to the latest version. We might have fixed the bug in the theme update.

To solve the issue, deactivate all the p: To solve the issue, deactivate all the plugins first, except the ones recommended by the theme. Then, hard reload your website using %1$s "Ctrl+Shift+R" %2$s on Windows. If the issues are fixed, start activating the plugins one by one, and reload and check your site each time. This will help you find out the plugin that is causing the problem.
